CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 9 reads: " NAACP Life Membership - The Squaws Club is civic-minded, as well as being a social organization. The group recently voted to purchase a life membership in NAACP.  The initial payment was made at their affair at the Hilton.  Mrs. Mary Shelton presented the check to Atty. Byrd R. Brown, president of the Pittsburgh NAACP. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Squaw Club member Mary Shelton presenting check to Byrd Brown for NAACP lifetime membership in Hilton Hotel during the Squaw Club "Cotton Extravaganza"
